text: "Hold Me Closer" is a song by English singer Elton John and American singer Britney Spears. It was released August 26, 2022. The song interpolates John's songs "Tiny Dancer", "The One", and "Don't Go Breaking My Heart". It is Spears' first single of new material in six years and first since her release from her 13-year conservatorship. ==References== Category:2022 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Britney Spears songs Category:Pop songs Category:Electro songs
title: Hold Me Closer
